question: Which of the following problem can be solved by Dialysis?
explanation:
Dialysis has been used since the 1940s to treat people with kidney problems. Dialysis is a treatment that filters and purifies the blood using a machine. This helps keep your fluids and electrolytes in balance when the kidneys can\'t do their job.
When kidneys fail, dialysis keeps your body in balance by removing waste, salt and extra water to prevent them from building up in the body and keeping a safe level of certain chemicals in your blood, such as potassium, sodium and bicarbonate.
